name: src/config/api.js
content:
// General API Configuration
export const API_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = 20000
export const API_DEFAULT_SERVER_URL = 'http://localhost:8080'
export const API_DEFAULT_ENDPOINT = '/'
export const API_DEFAULT_METHOD = 'GET'
export const API_DEFAULT_SECURE = false
export const API_DEFAULT_AUTH_TYPE = 'JWT'
export const API_DEFAULT_CACHE = 'no-cache'
export const API_SECURITY_TYPE_BEARER = 'Bearer'
export const API_SECURITY_TYPE_JWT = 'JWT'
export const API_JSON_CONTENT_TYPE = 'application/json'
export const API_FORM_CONTENT_TYPE = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
export const API_POST_METHOD = 'POST'
export const API_GET_METHOD = 'GET'
export const API_PUT_METHOD = 'PUT'
export const API_DELETE_METHOD = 'DELETE'

content:
The Chunky Universal Framework

Chunky Is The Full Stack Product Development Platform For Creative Developers.

Universal | Mobile | Web | Cloud | CLI | Wordpress
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "react-chunky",
  "version": "0.8.34",
  "description": "The Chunky Universal Framework",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/react-chunky/react-chunky.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "react-savor test",
    "lint": "react-savor lint",
    "coverage": "react-savor coverage",
    "docs": "react-savor doc"
  },
  "author": "I. Dan Calinescu <idancalinescu@gmail.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/react-chunky/react-chunky/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/react-chunky/react-chunky",
  "babel": {
    "plugins": [
      "transform-react-jsx"
    ],
    "presets": [
      "react",
      "env"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "base-64": "^0.1.0",
    "chalk": "^1.1.3",
    "country-data": "0.0.31",
    "deep-diff": "^0.3.8",
    "deepmerge": "^1.5.2",
    "error-stack-parser": "^1.3.6",
    "firebaseline": "0.x",
    "html-entities": "^1.2.1",
    "marked": "^0.3.6",
    "moment": "^2.15.1",
    "react": "^16.1.1",
    "react-redux": "^4.4.5",
    "react-transition-group": "^2.2.0",
    "redux": "^3.6.0",
    "redux-logger": "^2.7.0",
    "redux-promise": "^0.5.3",
    "redux-thunk": "^2.1.0",
    "remote-redux-devtools": "^0.5.0",
    "remote-redux-devtools-on-debugger": "^0.7.1",
    "reselect": "^2.5.4",
    "url-parse": "^1.1.9",
    "validator": "^8.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "react-savor": "0.x"
  }
}
name: package.json
